      • createNamespace

        public long createNamespace(NamespaceDescriptor namespaceDescriptor,
                            NonceKey nonceKey,
                            ProcedurePrepareLatch latch)
                     throws IOException
        从接口复制的说明: ClusterSchema
        Create a new Namespace.
        指定者:
        createNamespace 在接口中 ClusterSchema
        参数:
        namespaceDescriptor - descriptor for new Namespace
        nonceKey - A unique identifier for this operation from the client or process.
        latch - A latch to block on for precondition validation
        返回:
        procedure id
        抛出:
        IOException - Throws ClusterSchemaException and InterruptedIOException as well as IOException

                            NonceKey nonceKey,
                            ProcedurePrepareLatch latch)
                     throws IOException
        从接口复制的说明: ClusterSchema
        Delete an existing Namespace. Only empty Namespaces (no tables) can be removed.
        指定者:
        deleteNamespace 在接口中 ClusterSchema
        nonceKey - A unique identifier for this operation from the client or process.
        latch - A latch to block on for precondition validation
        返回:
        procedure id
        抛出:
        IOException - Throws ClusterSchemaException and InterruptedIOException as well as IOException
